title: Star Wars - Knights of the Old Republic (with latest patch)
description:
Hello!

This package contains the game Star Wars - Knights of the Old Republic. Detailed installation instructions are provided below. Happy gaming!

Instructions:

These are the instructions for successfully installing Star Wars - Knights of the Old Republic. Please read them carefully!

Step 0: Burn the ISO images to CD's, using a CD writing program such as Nero or CDBurnerXP (supplied here as "Apps\cdbxp_setup_4.1.2.745.exe"), burning them as images, NOT as files added to a compilation - requires 4 CD's
				OR 
Mount the images one at a time, as requested by the installation program, using an ISO mounting application, such as DAEMON Tools Lite 4.3.0.1 (which is provided here as "Apps\daemon4301-lite.exe")

Step 1: Install Star Wars - Knights of the Old Republic (main torrent folder) - 4 ISO images / CD's

Step 2: Install the Star Wars - Knights of the Old Republic 1.03 Patch (supplied as "Patch\SWKotOR1_03.exe")

Step 3: Copy the file "swkotor.exe", located in the "\Crack" directory, into your  Star Wars - Knights of the Old Republic installation folder (by default "C:\Program Files\LucasArts\SWKotOR"), overwriting the file there having this name

Step 4 (optional): If you own a new-generation video card and are experiencing lag on the Dantooine planet, please refer to the information provided inside the textfile "\Fix\fix.txt"

Step 5: Play the game!

Thank you for paying attention reading these hints!


Yours sincerely,
fireblade80
